highlights: Designed and shipped agentic workflows with LangGraph; added eval harness for prompt/route variants.
Built RAG services with pgvector/Chroma and Supabase auth; hardened RLS and observability.
Reduced p95 latency by ~30% via batching, caching, and response streaming.
Maintained prompt libraries, safety filters, and test sets; shipped provider-switching adapters.
Helped productize WriteAI features with FastAPI endpoints and SSR-safe UI states.
Prototyped classification and Streamlit dashboards for internal tooling.
Implemented computer vision baselines; improved data pre-processing throughput.
